title: Here's how Wall Street has already captured the climate-change movement, this critic says.
text:
Dow futures point to slide to end week as COVID-19 cases rise in Europe

Futures for the Dow and S&P 500 head lower Friday, amid growing concerns over rising cases of COVID-19 in the U.S. and a national lockdown in Austria See full story.

This is how America's booming demand for goods shattered the supply chain

The nation's nine largest ports handled 37.9 million TEUs of container volume from January of this year through September, up 34% from five years ago. See full story.

Apple reportedly revving up electric-vehicle plans — ‘a matter of when, not if'

Apple Inc. is looking to speed up its car development with a focus on full self-driving functions, according to a report Thursday. See full story.

Applied Materials blames supply-chain problems for earnings and forecast miss, stock drops from record high

Applied Materials stock sank in after-hours trading Thursday after it reported fourth-quarter and full-year results that missed sales and revenue expectations. See full story.

MARKETWATCH PERSONAL FINANCE

Frozen turkeys and hot oil are a dangerous combination. See full story.
